name: Summer: THE GAME
description:
SUMMER:
THE GAME Super Cool Downloaded Version

A game about enjoying some summer activities. Why don't you have fun with our collection of normal summer activities, such as smore roasting, swimming,  or stacking ice cream (yes that's all I had time to make sorry). Have fun, relax, and gain tokens to redeem for decorations, achievements, and bragging rights.

How Do I Play?

Download by scrolling down. I guess. No web version..

Where Content?

Content? Oh yeah there is content in the SUPER COOL DOWNLOADED VERSION but you know I'm not advertising it. In the SUPER COOL DOWNLOADED VERSION you can get cool secrets like a challenge thing and other stuff. This game will get you 30 minutes (most likely) to 3 hours of fun times. This game was made using my own sweat and tears. Also, I decided to not make a WEB version because I'm running out of sanity.

Game made in about a bit shy of 35 hours considering vacations, family stuff, and classes.  Worked one hour a day (on days i could work on it). So, uh, yeah. See ya.
